name: view_count
description: The number of views the channel has

name: video_count
description: The number of videos the channel has uploaded to it

name: subscriber_count
description: The number of subscribers the channel has

name: title
description: The title of the YouTube channel

name: country
description: The country the channel is from

name: topic_categories
description: A list of Wikipedia URLs that describe the channel's content.

name: clean_topics
description: A list of topics from topic_categories

name: datetime_updated
description: The datetime the data was pulled from YouTube
